title: Blueprint, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Bar", November 20, 1935
medium: Blueprint; double ruled border on white wove paper
markings: Stamps: Service fixture detail stamp in blueprint at lower right: see inscription and notes
inscribed: Inscribed at lower center: Plan of Bar/Scale 3/4"=1'-0"; Inscribed in blueprint in stamp: DONALD DESKEY / NEW YORK CITY / Johnson / 3/4"=1'-0"/ 11-20-35 / [No.] 1652-A Inscribed throughout with dimensions and descriptions
description:
Blueprint design for plan of bar, Jascha Heifetz Apartment. Left wall lined with glass paneled door cupboards, workspace to the right of the bar with towel ring, drain boards, and stainless steel sink. Curved outline of bar, with lacquered surface and arm rails. Stainless steel backsplash and lacquered counters. Bar closed off with gate.


Scale: 3/4"=1'0".

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Bar", November 20, 1935.
November 20, 1935. Blueprint; double ruled border on white wove paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-262.
